member.name: T:ServiceStack.OrmLite.PredicateBuilder
member.summary: Enables the efficient, dynamic composition of query predicates.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.PredicateBuilder.True``1
member.summary: Creates a predicate that evaluates to true.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.PredicateBuilder.False``1
member.summary: Creates a predicate that evaluates to false.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.PredicateBuilder.Create``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Creates a predicate expression from the specified lambda expression.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.PredicateBuilder.And``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Combines the first predicate with the second using the logical "and".

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.PredicateBuilder.Or``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Combines the first predicate with the second using the logical "or".

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.PredicateBuilder.Not``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Negates the predicate.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.PredicateBuilder.Compose``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{``0},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{``0},System.Func{System.Linq.Expressions.Expression,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression})
member.summary: Combines the first expression with the second using the specified merge function.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.OpenTransaction(System.Data.IDbConnection)
member.summary: Open a Transaction in OrmLite

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.OpenTransaction(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Data.IsolationLevel)
member.summary: Open a Transaction in OrmLite

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.GetDialectProvider(System.Data.IDbConnection)
member.summary: Return the IOrmLiteDialectProvider on this connection.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.SqlExpression``1
member.summary: Create a new SqlExpression builder allowing typed LINQ-like queries.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.Select``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary:
Returns results from using a LINQ Expression. E.g:
db.Select<Person>(x => x.Age > 40)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.Select``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Func{ServiceStack.OrmLite.SqlExpression{``0},ServiceStack.OrmLite.SqlExpression{``0}})
member.summary:
Returns results from using an SqlExpression lambda. E.g:
db.Select<Person>(q => q.Where(x => x.Age > 40))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.Select``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,ServiceStack.OrmLite.SqlExpression{``0})
member.summary:
Returns results from using an SqlExpression lambda. E.g:
db.Select(db.SqlExpression<Person>().Where(x => x.Age > 40))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.Single``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary:
Returns a single result from using a LINQ Expression. E.g:
db.Single<Person>(x => x.Age == 42)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.Single``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Func{ServiceStack.OrmLite.SqlExpression{``0},ServiceStack.OrmLite.SqlExpression{``0}})
member.summary:
Returns a single result from using an SqlExpression lambda. E.g:
db.Single<Person>(q => q.Where(x => x.Age == 42))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.Single``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,ServiceStack.OrmLite.SqlExpression{``0})
member.summary:
Returns results from using an SqlExpression lambda. E.g:
db.Select<Person>(x => x.Age > 40)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.Scalar``2(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,``1}})
member.summary:
Returns a scalar result from using an SqlExpression lambda. E.g:
db.Scalar<Person, int>(x => Sql.Max(x.Age))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.Scalar``2(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,``1}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary:
Returns a scalar result from using an SqlExpression lambda. E.g:
db.Scalar<Person, int>(x => Sql.Max(x.Age), , x => x.Age < 50)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.Count``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary:
Returns the count of rows that match the LINQ expression, E.g:
db.Count<Person>(x => x.Age < 50)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.Count``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Func{ServiceStack.OrmLite.SqlExpression{``0},ServiceStack.OrmLite.SqlExpression{``0}})
member.summary:
Returns the count of rows that match the SqlExpression lambda, E.g:
db.Count<Person>(q => q.Where(x => x.Age < 50))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.ReadConnectionExtensions.Count``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,ServiceStack.OrmLite.SqlExpression{``0})
member.summary:
Returns the count of rows that match the supplied SqlExpression, E.g:
db.Count(db.SqlExpression<Person>().Where(x => x.Age < 50))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.WriteConnectionExtensions.InsertOnly``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0,System.Func{ServiceStack.OrmLite.SqlExpression{``0},ServiceStack.OrmLite.SqlExpression{``0}})
member.summary:
Insert only fields in POCO specified by the SqlExpression lambda. E.g:
db.InsertOnly(new Person { FirstName = "Amy", Age = 27 }, ev => ev.Insert(p => new { p.FirstName, p.Age }))

member.name: T:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteConnectionWrapper
member.summary: Wrapper IDbConnection class to manage db connection events

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Select``1(System.Data.IDbConnection)
member.summary: Returns results from the active connection.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Select``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String)
member.summary:
Returns results from using sql. E.g:
db.Select<Person>("Age > 40")
db.Select<Person>("SELECT * FROM Person WHERE Age > 40")

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Select``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns results from using a parameterized query. E.g:
db.Select<Person>("Age > @age", new { age = 40})
db.Select<Person>("SELECT * FROM Person WHERE Age > @age", new { age = 40})

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Select``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary:
Returns results from using a parameterized query. E.g:
db.Select<Person>("Age > @age", new Dictionary<string, object> { { "age", 40 } })
db.Select<Person>("SELECT * FROM Person WHERE Age > @age", new Dictionary<string, object> { { "age", 40 } })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SelectFmt``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary:
Returns results from using an SqlFormat query. E.g:
db.SelectFmt<Person>("Age > {0}", 40)
db.SelectFmt<Person>("SELECT * FROM Person WHERE Age > {0}", 40)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Select``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Type)
member.summary:
Returns a partial subset of results from the specified tableType. E.g:
db.Select<EntityWithId>(typeof(Person))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SelectFmt``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Type,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary:
Returns a partial subset of results from the specified tableType using a SqlFormat query. E.g:
db.SelectFmt<EntityWithId>(typeof(Person), "Age > {0}", 40)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Where``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns results from using a single name, value filter. E.g:
db.Where<Person>("Age", 27)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Where``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns results from using an anonymous type filter. E.g:
db.Where<Person>(new { Age = 27 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SelectByIds``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary:
Returns results using the supplied primary key ids. E.g:
db.SelectByIds<Person>(new[] { 1, 2, 3 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SelectNonDefaults``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0)
member.summary:
Query results using the non-default values in the supplied partially populated POCO example. E.g:
db.SelectNonDefaults(new Person { Id = 1 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SelectNonDefaults``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,``0)
member.summary:
Query results using the non-default values in the supplied partially populated POCO example. E.g:
db.SelectNonDefaults("Age > @Age", new Person { Age = 42 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SelectLazy``1(System.Data.IDbConnection)
member.summary:
Returns a lazyily loaded stream of results. E.g:
db.SelectLazy<Person>()

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SelectLazy``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns a lazyily loaded stream of results using a parameterized query. E.g:
db.SelectLazy<Person>("Age > @age", new { age = 40 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SelectLazyFmt``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary:
Returns a lazyily loaded stream of results using an SqlFilter query. E.g:
db.SelectLazyFmt<Person>("Age > {0}", 40)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.WhereLazy``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns a stream of results that are lazily loaded using a parameterized query. E.g:
db.WhereLazy<Person>(new { Age = 27 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Single``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns the first result using a parameterized query. E.g:
db.Single<Person>(new { Age = 42 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Single``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns results from using a single name, value filter. E.g:
db.Single<Person>("Age = @age", new { age = 42 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SingleFmt``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary:
Returns the first result using a SqlFormat query. E.g:
db.SingleFmt<Person>("Age = {0}", 42)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SingleById``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns the first result using a primary key id. E.g:
db.SingleById<Person>(1)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SingleWhere``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns the first result using a name, value filter. E.g:
db.SingleWhere<Person>("Age", 42)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Scalar``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns a single scalar value using a parameterized query. E.g:
db.Scalar<int>("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Person WHERE Age > @age", new { age = 40 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.ScalarFmt``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary:
Returns a single scalar value using an SqlFormat query. E.g:
db.ScalarFmt<int>("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Person WHERE Age > {0}", 40)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Column``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns the first column in a List using a SqlFormat query. E.g:
db.Column<string>("SELECT LastName FROM Person WHERE Age = @age", new { age = 27 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.ColumnFmt``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary:
Returns the first column in a List using a SqlFormat query. E.g:
db.ColumnFmt<string>("SELECT LastName FROM Person WHERE Age = {0}", 27)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.ColumnDistinct``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns the distinct first column values in a HashSet using an SqlFormat query. E.g:
db.ColumnDistinct<int>("SELECT Age FROM Person WHERE Age < @age", new { age = 50 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.ColumnDistinctFmt``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary:
Returns the distinct first column values in a HashSet using an SqlFormat query. E.g:
db.ColumnDistinctFmt<int>("SELECT Age FROM Person WHERE Age < {0}", 50)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Lookup``2(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns an Dictionary<K, List<V>> grouping made from the first two columns using an parameterized query. E.g:
db.Lookup<int, string>("SELECT Age, LastName FROM Person WHERE Age < @age", new { age = 50 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.LookupFmt``2(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary:
Returns an Dictionary<K, List<V>> grouping made from the first two columns using an SqlFormat query. E.g:
db.LookupFmt<int, string>("SELECT Age, LastName FROM Person WHERE Age < {0}", 50)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Dictionary``2(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns a Dictionary from the first 2 columns: Column 1 (Keys), Column 2 (Values) using sql. E.g:
db.Dictionary<int, string>("SELECT Id, LastName FROM Person WHERE Age < @age", new { age = 50 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.DictionaryFmt``2(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary:
Returns a Dictionary from the first 2 columns: Column 1 (Keys), Column 2 (Values) using an SqlFormat query. E.g:
db.DictionaryFmt<int, string>("SELECT Id, LastName FROM Person WHERE Age < {0}", 50)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Exists``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns true if the Query returns any records, using an SqlFormat query. E.g:
db.Exists<Person>(new { Age = 42 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.Exists``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns true if the Query returns any records, using a parameterized query. E.g:
db.Exists<Person>("Age = @age", new { age = 42 })
db.Exists<Person>("SELECT * FROM Person WHERE Age = @age", new { age = 42 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.ExistsFmt``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary:
Returns true if the Query returns any records, using an SqlFormat query. E.g:
db.ExistsFmt<Person>("Age = {0}", 42)
db.ExistsFmt<Person>("SELECT * FROM Person WHERE Age = {0}", 50)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SqlList``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns results from an arbitrary parameterized raw sql query. E.g:
db.SqlList<Person>("EXEC GetRockstarsAged @age", new { age = 50 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SqlList``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary:
Returns results from an arbitrary parameterized raw sql query. E.g:
db.SqlList<Person>("EXEC GetRockstarsAged @age", new Dictionary<string, object> { { "age", 42 } })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SqlColumn``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns the first column in a List using a parameterized query. E.g:
db.SqlColumn<string>("SELECT LastName FROM Person WHERE Age < @age", new { age = 50 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SqlColumn``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary:
Returns the first column in a List using a parameterized query. E.g:
db.SqlColumn<string>("SELECT LastName FROM Person WHERE Age < @age", new Dictionary<string, object> { { "age", 50 } })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SqlScalar``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns a single Scalar value using a parameterized query. E.g:
db.SqlScalar<int>("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Person WHERE Age < @age", new { age = 50 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SqlScalar``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary:
Returns a single Scalar value using a parameterized query. E.g:
db.SqlScalar<int>("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Person WHERE Age < @age", new Dictionary<string, object> { { "age", 50 } })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.LastInsertId(System.Data.IDbConnection)
member.summary: Returns the last insert Id made from this connection.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String)
member.summary:
Executes a raw sql non-query using sql. E.g:
var rowsAffected = db.ExecuteNonQuery("UPDATE Person SET LastName={0} WHERE Id={1}".SqlFormat("WaterHouse", 7))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Executes a raw sql non-query using a parameterized query. E.g:
var rowsAffected = db.ExecuteNonQuery("UPDATE Person SET LastName=@name WHERE Id=@id", new { name = "WaterHouse", id = 7 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Executes a raw sql non-query using a parameterized query.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SqlProcedure``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Object)
member.summary: Returns results from a Stored Procedure, using a parameterized query.

member.summary: Returns results from a Stored Procedure using an SqlFormat query. E.g:

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.LongScalar(System.Data.IDbConnection)
member.summary: Returns the scalar result as a long.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.LoadSingleById``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns the first result with all its references loaded, using a primary key id. E.g:
db.LoadSingleById<Person>(1)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SaveAllReferences``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0)
member.summary:
Populates all related references on the instance with its primary key and saves them. Uses '(T)Id' naming convention. E.g:
db.SaveAllReferences(customer)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SaveReferences``2(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0,``1[])
member.summary:
Populates the related references with the instance primary key and saves them. Uses '(T)Id' naming convention. E.g:
db.SaveReference(customer, customer.Orders)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SaveReferences``2(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0,System.Collections.Generic.List{``1})
member.summary:
Populates the related references with the instance primary key and saves them. Uses '(T)Id' naming convention. E.g:
db.SaveReference(customer, customer.Orders)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.SaveReferences``2(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``1})
member.summary:
Populates the related references with the instance primary key and saves them. Uses '(T)Id' naming convention. E.g:
db.SaveReferences(customer, customer.Orders)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteReadConnectionExtensions.LoadReferences``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0)
member.summary:
Loads all the related references onto the instance. E.g:
db.LoadReferences(customer)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.TableExists(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String)
member.summary:
Checks whether a Table Exists. E.g:
db.TableExists("Person")

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.CreateTables(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Boolean,System.Type[])
member.summary:
Create DB Tables from the schemas of runtime types. E.g:
db.CreateTables(typeof(Table1), typeof(Table2))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.CreateTable(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Boolean,System.Type)
member.summary:
Create DB Table from the schema of the runtime type. Use overwrite to drop existing Table. E.g:
db.CreateTable(true, typeof(Table))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.CreateTableIfNotExists(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Type[])
member.summary:
Only Create new DB Tables from the schemas of runtime types if they don't already exist. E.g:
db.CreateTableIfNotExists(typeof(Table1), typeof(Table2))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.DropAndCreateTables(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Type[])
member.summary:
Drop existing DB Tables and re-create them from the schemas of runtime types. E.g:
db.DropAndCreateTables(typeof(Table1), typeof(Table2))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.CreateTable``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Create a DB Table from the generic type. Use overwrite to drop the existing table or not. E.g:
db.CreateTable<Person>(overwrite=false) //default
db.CreateTable<Person>(overwrite=true)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.CreateTableIfNotExists``1(System.Data.IDbConnection)
member.summary:
Only create a DB Table from the generic type if it doesn't already exist. E.g:
db.CreateTableIfNotExists<Person>()

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.CreateTableIfNotExists(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Type)
member.summary:
Only create a DB Table from the runtime type if it doesn't already exist. E.g:
db.CreateTableIfNotExists(typeof(Person))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.DropAndCreateTable``1(System.Data.IDbConnection)
member.summary:
Drop existing table if exists and re-create a DB Table from the generic type. E.g:
db.DropAndCreateTable<Person>()

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.DropAndCreateTable(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Type)
member.summary:
Drop existing table if exists and re-create a DB Table from the runtime type. E.g:
db.DropAndCreateTable(typeof(Person))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.DropTables(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Type[])
member.summary:
Drop any existing tables from their runtime types. E.g:
db.DropTables(typeof(Table1),typeof(Table2))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.DropTable(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Type)
member.summary:
Drop any existing tables from the runtime type. E.g:
db.DropTable(typeof(Person))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.DropTable``1(System.Data.IDbConnection)
member.summary:
Drop any existing tables from the generic type. E.g:
db.DropTable<Person>()

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.GetLastSql(System.Data.IDbConnection)
member.summary: Get the last SQL statement that was executed.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.ExecuteSql(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String)
member.summary: Execute any arbitrary raw SQL.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.Insert``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Insert 1 POCO, use selectIdentity to retrieve the last insert AutoIncrement id (if any). E.g:
var id = db.Insert(new Person { Id = 1, FirstName = "Jimi }, selectIdentity:true)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.Insert``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0[])
member.summary:
Insert 1 or more POCOs in a transaction. E.g:
db.Insert(new Person { Id = 1, FirstName = "Tupac", LastName = "Shakur", Age = 25 },
new Person { Id = 2, FirstName = "Biggie", LastName = "Smalls", Age = 24 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.InsertAll``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary:
Insert a collection of POCOs in a transaction. E.g:
db.InsertAll(new[] { new Person { Id = 9, FirstName = "Biggie", LastName = "Smalls", Age = 24 } })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.Update``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0)
member.summary:
Updates 1 POCO. All fields are updated except for the PrimaryKey which is used as the identity selector. E.g:
db.Update(new Person { Id = 1, FirstName = "Jimi", LastName = "Hendrix", Age = 27 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.Update``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0[])
member.summary:
Updates 1 or more POCOs in a transaction. E.g:
db.Update(new Person { Id = 1, FirstName = "Tupac", LastName = "Shakur", Age = 25 },
new Person { Id = 2, FirstName = "Biggie", LastName = "Smalls", Age = 24 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.UpdateAll``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary:
Updates 1 or more POCOs in a transaction. E.g:
db.UpdateAll(new[] { new Person { Id = 1, FirstName = "Jimi", LastName = "Hendrix", Age = 27 } })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.Delete``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Object)
member.summary:
Delete rows using an anonymous type filter. E.g:
db.Delete<Person>(new { FirstName = "Jimi", Age = 27 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.Delete``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Object[])
member.summary:
Delete 1 or more rows in a transaction using an anonymous type filter. E.g:
db.Delete<Person>(new { FirstName = "Jimi", Age = 27 }, new { FirstName = "Janis", Age = 27 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.Delete``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0)
member.summary:
Delete 1 row using all fields in the filter. E.g:
db.Delete(new Person { Id = 1, FirstName = "Jimi", LastName = "Hendrix", Age = 27 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.Delete``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0[])
member.summary:
Delete 1 or more rows in a transaction using all fields in the filter. E.g:
db.Delete(new Person { Id = 1, FirstName = "Jimi", LastName = "Hendrix", Age = 27 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.DeleteNonDefaults``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0)
member.summary:
Delete 1 or more rows using only field with non-default values in the filter. E.g:
db.DeleteNonDefaults(new Person { FirstName = "Jimi", Age = 27 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.DeleteNonDefaults``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0[])
member.summary:
Delete 1 or more rows in a transaction using only field with non-default values in the filter. E.g:
db.DeleteNonDefaults(new Person { FirstName = "Jimi", Age = 27 }, new Person { FirstName = "Janis", Age = 27 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.DeleteById``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Object)
member.summary:
Delete 1 row by the PrimaryKey. E.g:
db.DeleteById<Person>(1)

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.DeleteByIds``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary:
Delete all rows identified by the PrimaryKeys. E.g:
db.DeleteById<Person>(new[] { 1, 2, 3 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.DeleteAll``1(System.Data.IDbConnection)
member.summary:
Delete all rows in the generic table type. E.g:
db.DeleteAll<Person>()

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.DeleteAll(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Type)
member.summary:
Delete all rows in the runtime table type. E.g:
db.DeleteAll(typeof(Person))

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.Save``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Insert a new row or update existing row. Returns true if a new row was inserted. Optional references param decides whether to save all related references as well. E.g:
db.Save(customer, references:true)
member.returns: true if a row was inserted; false if it was updated

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.Save``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0[])
member.summary:
Insert new rows or update existing rows. Return number of rows added E.g:
db.Save(new Person { Id = 10, FirstName = "Amy", LastName = "Winehouse", Age = 27 })

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.OrmLiteWriteConnectionExtensions.SaveAll``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary:
Insert new rows or update existing rows. Return number of rows added E.g:
db.SaveAll(new [] { new Person { Id = 10, FirstName = "Amy", LastName = "Winehouse", Age = 27 } })

member.summary: Execute parameterized SQL

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.Dapper.SqlMapper.Dapper(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Data.CommandType})
member.summary: Return a list of dynamic objects, reader is closed after the call

member.name: M:ServiceStack.OrmLite.Dapper.SqlMapper.Dapper``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Object,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Data.CommandType})
member.summary: Executes a query, returning the data typed as per T
member.remarks: the dynamic param may seem a bit odd, but this works around a major usability issue in vs, if it is Object vs completion gets annoying. Eg type new [space] get new object
member.returns: A sequence of data of the supplied type; if a basic type (int, string, etc) is queried then the data from the first column in assumed, otherwise an instance is created per row, and a direct column-name===member-name mapping is assumed (case insensitive).

member.name: P:ServiceStack.OrmLite.Dapper.SqlMapper.ConnectionStringComparer
member.summary: How should connection strings be compared for equivalence? Defaults to StringComparer.Ordinal. Providing a custom implementation can be useful for allowing multi-tenancy databases with identical schema to share startegies. Note that usual equivalence rules apply: any equivalent connection strings MUST yield the same hash-code.

member.summary: This is a micro-cache; suitable when the number of terms is controllable (a few hundred, for example), and strictly append-only; you cannot change existing values. All key matches are on **REFERENCE** equality. The type is fully thread-safe.
